title: 電視劇微微一笑很傾城 01 LOVE O2O CROTON MEGAHIT Official

json.text: as usual, attack him from the back
wow, we are so lucky today
let's make that necklace the bonus
I see, so you want the necklace
you are top 10 on this server
I don't stand a chance against you
you can ask luwei weiwei to PK for you
I will give you a mage ring that goes with the necklace
See you at the inn outside Jinling city at 5
we have been married for half a year
you are still calling me Zhenshui?
the daily quest is 12 three-eye monkeys
can you kill them for me?
honey, you can just sit and watch
you are studying in a university in Beijing, right?
i know a very good Japanese restaurant
it is comparable to michelin three stars in Japan
it is great to just enjoy ourselves in the game
that you don't know whether you are playing with a human or a dog
i just want to make sure...
I want to see how you look like
could you send me your photo?
the course taught by Professor Yu is great
weiwei, there is nobody outside, hurry!
what happened? suddenly the power is out
the circuit seems to be burnt
i just cooked a noodle and the circuit is out?
the dorm assistant will be mad at me...
oh please, before you cook the noodle
could you please calculate the amp?
what can I do? My noodles are still in the pot
give me half of your noodles
no wonder we CS girls can't find our Mr Right
we did all the stuff ourselves
what do we need the guys for?
firstly, It right that i did the job
but that's nothing to do with you not being able to find a boyfriend
secondly, my friend online just asked me for a photo
he must think that I don't dare to share my photo
how are you going to  compensate me for the damage to my reputation?
ah, your husband in the game?
you peeped again when i was playing the game
don't pay attention to these trivial details
so are you going to give him your photo?
We got married to do couple quests
it is weird to share photos
but it is not nice to go offline like that
at least I should have given an excuse
for example, my computer has crashed
and i lost all my photos
your computer has crashed and you lost all your photos?
when I borrowed your laptop yesterday
my noodles! I haven't finished my noodles
you damaged my laptop and you still want your noodles?
xiaoling went to meet her boyfriend
yet I have to accompany you to have your laptop fixed
this nice weather is all wasted...
who damaged my laptop? Let's go!
there are a few movies coming up soon
let's send the laptop for repair
I won't leave it in the store
I will buy a mother board and replace it myself
it is cheaper and faster that way
and I have to use my laptop tonight
no need to be so rushed...
a good CS student like me
will not live a day without a computer
I have an appointment with somebody to PK tonight
how time flies! We are sophomore already
it is hard to believe that in this university with tons of guys and a few girls
I haven't found anyone after two years!
that's not the reason you picked this university, right?
Tsing University offers the No. 1 engineering course in China
are just as important as my marriage!
Xiao Nai the legend is coming back for the basketball game!
we can see the legend play again!
Xiao Nai is the key player
we will for sure see him this time
xiao nai is already a senior
and he rarely comes to the campus now
it is said that the mystic post in BBS
hasn't been updated for a long time
I guess this time they are bluffing again
there is nothing to lose to just go there and take a look
this might be the last chance to see him
why doesn't he go to graduate school?
we have to go there one hour early to get a seat
I didn't know you were into Xiao Nai too
of course, he is the legend
I downloaded all the softwares he posted
If our college is like a game
he will be the top for every skill
I only pay attention to the face and the body
I can't understand you genius anyway
who hacked the video of him swmming last time?
I really want to see it
how can I ask him to help?
I know a person from his dorm
so I came up with this idea
and then go to ask him to help
I doubt they will not help given it is you
i already sent the goods over
you can go ask around, that's the price everywhere
no way, it is already the cheapest we can offer
the gold glare on this RAM doesn't look right
you give a price for a brand new one
this is none of your buniness
well, I am from CS, how much do you think I know?
this store is just in front of my university
yet you are selling at such an unfair price
i am afraid you won't get much business if the students know about it
that's true, this is too much
which previous owner? I have always been the boss here
what's wrong with you two young girls
are you looking for trouble here?
you look so pretty, yet you have a filthy mouth. Shoo...
you can google for it if you don't believe me
the online ones are all fake
this girl looks like Bei Weiwei
I believe the boss will not lie to me
and it is reasonable for him to earn some profit
She pretended to be so nice and up-class
we were trying to help her
now we looked like bad people
it must be because they recognized you
you know her right? Meng Yiran
she was voted the most pretty girl on campus
oh, that's why she looks familiar
of course she doesn't have good temper with you
and I won't forget who uploaded my picture online
you already searched my PC and phone last year
Besides, I wouldn't upload such a blurry picture
I would have posted an up-front, HD picture
and about the picture of Meng Yiran
do you think it was PS?
and it took a few days to PS
She doesn't look as good in real
if she had posted a non-touched picture
I can assure that you wouldn't have lost
I will go to the internet cafe later
and I remember she won last year
she's the champion, and I am the runner up.
so I should be the one who is hostile
why is she hostile towards me?
why you can't find a boyfriend
tell me! i will change at once
because obviously you pay more attention to girls
weiwei, you think I don't dare to beat you up
take my laptop home for me
you have no place to stand on
you spend all your time with computer
you want to start a company?
I will start developing two games first
I will give you a gift
I don't think i am late
whether you are late or not, the outcome will still be the same
no wonder luwei weiwei is the only top female player on the PK list
how does she operate her flying skill so well?
yet she is only No. 6 on the PK list?
Is No.1 the legendary Yixiao naihe?
I don't know if I have met him before
okay, but I am in an internet cafe
I only paid for an hour
uncle will give you a gift
this place shall be my gift
don't you want to run a game company?
this place is good for a start up after renovating
i just feel that there's more sense of satisfaction starting from scratch
besides, I have already found a place
we are both mutants in the family
how come you are doing CS
I can tell that you are my type
I don't have lots of time for this internet cafe
If you don't want this place
boss, there's a call for you
it is almost time to go to your place
I will make a couple of dishes
I don't know how to solve this problem
erxi, can you take my bed sheet back for me?
erxi, can you please bring my bed sheet back
you have the time to bug me, why not go get it yourself
I have my facial mask on
why didn't you take your bed sheet back
the heroin must have been fighting in the game
she even left her laptop with me
oh, today the heroin and I
when did you get to know Meng Yiran?
how come you didn't mention about it?
I went to the computer store with erxi
the owner was trying to trick her into buying a second hand RAM
I couldn't just sit and  watch
But i believe the boss will not lie to me
besides it is fair that he's earning some profit, he is doing a business after all'
what? now she is the nice one, and we are just caring about price
in the end the boss wouldn't even sell anything to us
weiwei, what will you do to your laptop then?
It is expensive to change motherboard anyway
I will buy a capacitance online
although I am also a CS major
we are not in the same college
where is the stuff I left here this morning?
are you looking for the notebook for the game?
do you know where it is?
and I have no idea what you are writing about
other than study, gaming, and taking notes
you should also do something else
no need, I like it this way
maybe I will become a game designer in the future
and I will rely on this
I may be lucky to join FengTeng
and take part in the game design of  the new "pretty ghost story"
other people play games to kill time
you play game to plan your career
the brain of a good student
Yiran, I have to write a report
can you wait for me here
so the girl yesterday was Bei Weiwei
yes, the runner up in the college beauty contest
the one who lost to you
she is not as good as you
and looks like a pretty vase
if she acts in a TV drama
she must be one of the supporting actresses
nana, don't bad mouth people like that
fine fine fine, can't I tell the truth?
she is dfferent from what I expected
she was just showing off her knowledge
just because you fall in love with a CS student
don't fall in love with all CS students
and assume that all CS students are nice
a few days ago Cao Guang took a photo of her
getting out of a luxury car
that car costs at least a few million
Bei Weiwei is not as simple as you thought
can you show Yiran and me
the photo you took of Bei Weiwei
it didn't occur to me that I should take a photo
you want to cover up for her?
why would I be interested in that kind of girl?
zhenyi tech is recruiting summer interns
they want a few CS majors
Shall I apply for you all?
we have to find summer intern anyway
apply for Xiaoling and sisi too
if I have hardware issue in the future
got on to the game immediately
I have done all my revision
you are so full of yourself
actually, I thought gaming was a waste of time before
but after I started playing it
I found that it is a whole new world
I will compensate you with a set of armor
no need, I will be there soon
Today the moon is still the same
however the love and hate changed
[ are you sure you want to break up?][yes][no]
drink the water, forget the love
the relationship between Luwei weiwei and Zhenshui Wuxiang
and they will go on separate ways
for the sake of completing the quest
don't feel bad for the divorce
I am going to my daily quest
let's fight the boss together in the future if there's a chance
are you asking me what happened?
I heard that he will marry xiaoyu yaoyao soon
She was the first in the "dream angel" contest
go take a look on the official webpage
I will take a look now
yes, anyway we had gotten married for the sake of quests
I still feel it is quite disappointing
I feel Zhenshui is a good person
I didn't expect to see this happen
I heard the original target of Xiaoyu yaoyao
was that guy in the armor ranking list
I didn't expect her to end up with Zhenshui
I saw them leveling up together
well, it is not entirely his fault
you're ranked no.6 in the list
and you have never asked guys for armor
actually everyone thought you were a "lady boy"
not showing photo doesn't mean i am a lady boy
I hate this world where only the look matters
you are the prettiest girl in CS
I was reading the crucial moment
and imaging myself as the leading girl
and you dragged me back to reality
I really have a good feeling about this couple
give as wedding gift this time?
I can't help but think of Luwei Weiwei
I wonder how she is feeling like right now
I saw the ex-wife of Zhenshui
standing on the bridge of red sparrow
people only see the smiles on the new couple
who will listen to the cry of the abandoned?
she may be here to take the groom
be quick, I want to go to bathroom too
I support weiwei for snatching Zhenshui
you can be a fair lady
there is no need for this
[xiao yu yao yao is shameless 108] player is banned for 24 hours for use of  improper language
what's wrong with that luwei weiwei
yet she has the cheek to show up
that lady boy must be jealous of yaoyao
and is here to bully her
yes, you have to settle this
he didn't want this to happen
I just went to the bathroom
now everyone thought I am here to kidnap the groom
people will definitely think that I am heart broken
I am just here to watch the show
it is embarrassing to either stay or leave
I want it! I want it!
I came first, let me have it
I am here first, don't fight
I want this one and this one
when will you be putting up a sale again?
how did you like this ceremony?
is the legend here to gossip?
